name: Patti Hattu!: Cosmic Revolt
storyline:
Get ready to embark on an intergalactic adventure! This electrifying ball-rolling arcade racer is a thrilling fusion of puzzle-solving, platforming, racing, and parkour-inspired action!

With lightning-fast gameplay and intuitive controls, Patti Hattu! Cosmic Revolt will have you on the edge of your seat from the moment you hit play. Addictive "just one more try" gameplay makes it perfect for both casual gamers and seasoned pros alike.

Delve into a world of finely-tuned physics and thoughtfully designed levels. Master the in-game abilities and you'll effortlessly unleash spectacular stunts and add layers of depth to your gameplay.

Enter The Trials and uncover a world of hidden treasures and clandestine shortcuts, meticulously designed to elevate your gameplay to legendary status! Discover the thrill of unearthing secret items and pathways that promise to skyrocket your ratings to the top!

With mysteries waiting to be unraveled, igniting your imagination and sparking the question, "What if I dared to try this?" The journey to greatness begins now—will you seize the opportunity?
summary: Abducted and forced to perform in a galactic trial of skill, can you master the challenges and return home?
